body_html: @sxpc722 That should work then. By the way, the new machine is Windows 10 and I am not planning to dual-boot it with Linux until I absolutely have to do so! I'm sick of chasing down driver and library bugs for vendors (looking at you, AMD). In fact, I may put a Windows partition on my workstation for the same AMD reason. ;-)

body: @sxpc722 That should work then. By the way, the new machine is Windows 10 and I am not planning to dual-boot it with Linux until I absolutely have to do so! I'm sick of chasing down driver and library bugs for vendors (looking at you, AMD). In fact, I may put a Windows partition on my workstation for the same AMD reason. ;-)
